item.title: Chinese Powered Self-Sufficiency in Africa
item.description: Madam President Ellen Johnson-Sirleaf the current President of Liberia did a remarkable thing yesterday. Â She [told ][2]the world that in ten years Liberia would be self-sufficient and able to stand on its own feet with only further investment and no aid.
